sentences.sContent: These chromatic stone carvings are all made from a whole piece of stone.
sentences.sContent_eng: These chromatic stone carvings are all made from a whole piece of stone.
sentences.sCn: 这些彩色石雕作品均为一块完整的石材雕刻而成。

sentences.sContent: As final touches, aimed to eliminate some "fake CG looks", we added to all the images some slight chromatic aberration, a very subtle vignette, a few glow and some flare effects on light source.
sentences.sContent_eng: As final touches, aimed to eliminate some "fake CG looks", we added to all the images some slight chromatic aberration, a very subtle vignette, a few glow and some flare effects on light source.
sentences.sCn: 在最后的处理上，去除了一些“虚假的CG外表”，我们给所有图像增加了一些轻微的色差，只是给光源稍微增加一点图案、发光和一些光斑效果。

synos.tran: 彩色的；色品的；易染色的

words.tran: [遗] 染色单体，染色半体；染色分体
富有半音音阶的音乐作风；半音阶之使用
